575 words written on Wed, Oct 9 2002

Comment Providing you the public service of teaching you all the Bosnian I know

Today I really did apsurdne posoriste in my little 1.5hr class. I acted out each part in full drama‚Ä¶

I‚Äôm calling this one the secret, part 2 in the cheese series:

Momak Jeden: Gdje je to? Dude one: Where is it? Momak Dva: To je ovdje. Dude two: It‚Äôs here. 1: Da li je to novo? Is it new? 2: Da, to je novo. Yeah, it‚Äôs new. 1: To je lijepo. It‚Äôs beautiful. 2: Da, to je vrlo lijepo. Yeah, it‚Äôs really beautiful. 1: Zelim to. I want it. 2: Trebas to? Do you neeeed it? 1: Da, ja volim to. Yeah, I love it. 2: Vidim. I seeee 1: Oprostite? Excuse me? 2: Da? 1: Sta je to? What is it?

Now I just have to pause to say three things real quick: 1) This whole thing started because I couldn‚Äôt keep gdje (where?) and ovdje (here) straight in my head, so I had written the first two sentences in my book to help me. Then it just kinda ran. 2) I need to embed Bosnian fonts or something because it really needs the accent marks‚Äìnot that you would know how to pronounce it anyway! :) and 3) I‚Äôm realizing how much this is like Jon‚Äôs Lady in Red skit. What a great influence! The trouper himself! :) ‚Ä¶and the uninvited point 4) The next part was written a day after the first part‚Ä¶

2: Prekjucer to je bila riba. The day before yesterday it was a fish. 1: Sta je bilo jucer? What was it yesterday? 2: Jucer je bilo pivo. Yesterday it was a beer. 1: Sta je to danas? What is it today? 2: To je tajna That‚Äôs a secret. 1: Znam li tu tajnu? Do I know that secret? 2: Ne znas. You don‚Äôt know. 1: Znam tajnu. I know the secret. 2: Da? Sta je tajna? Yeah? What‚Äôs the secret? 1: To je orah. It‚Äôs a walnut. 2: Ne, ti ne znas tajnu. Nope, you don‚Äôt know the secret. 1: Zar nije to orah? Isn‚Äôt that a walnut? 2: Ne, to nije orah. 1: To je sir. It‚Äôs cheese. 2: Ne, to nije sir. 1: Ja mislim to je sir. I know that‚Äôs cheese. 2: To nije sir. 1: To je sir! 2: Ne. 1: Ja cu to jesti! I‚Äôm going to eat it! 2: Ti ne zelis to jesti. You don‚Äôt want to eat it. 1: Ja cu to jesti sada! I‚Äôm going to eat it right now! 2: Ja ne mislim da ti zelis to jesti‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt think you want to eat it‚Ä¶ (Momak to jede.) Dude eats it. 1: Fuj! To je strasno! Yuk! It‚Äôs terrible! 2: Vidis? See? 1: Fuj! 2: Ja pjevam: ‚ÄúTi ne zelis to jesti!‚Äù I sing: (sing) ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt want to eat it!‚Äù 1: Sta je to? 2: Ti trebas vodu. You need water. (fetch water) 1: Sta je to bilo? What was that? 2: Popij malu vode. Drink a little water. 1: To je smece! That‚Äôs trash! (read: shit; but I don‚Äôt know that word yet) 2: Sada znas tajnu. Now you know the secret. 1: To je strasno smece! 2: Da li doruckujes dobro? Are you having a nice breakfast? (laugh mockingly) 1: Strasno! 2: Sada idem. Cau! Now I go.
